about_the_game:
This is Relic Odyssey's Demo and includes one level called the Xantao Temple.

The demo includes quite a few of the game mechanics that should give the player a good feeling about the game.

The game will start with some equipment right away that is normally only acquired with some playtime in the full game.

This includes the Xantoa Glove, Clunky the sidekick and some weapons.

Enjoy!
detailed_description:
This is Relic Odyssey's Demo and includes one level called the Xantao Temple.

The demo includes quite a few of the game mechanics that should give the player a good feeling about the game.

The game will start with some equipment right away that is normally only acquired with some playtime in the full game.

This includes the Xantoa Glove, Clunky the sidekick and some weapons.

Enjoy!
